 1678: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1679: multipart_chunks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1680:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/multipart_chunks.html", Config), []},
 1681:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1682:     {ok, Ref} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1683:                               [{sync, false}, {stream, self} | RequestOpts], ?profile(Config)),
 1684:     ok = receive_stream_n(Ref, 10),
 1685:     httpc:cancel_request(Ref).
 1686:     
 1687: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1688: timeout_memory_leak() ->
 1689:     [{doc, "Check OTP-8739"}].
 1690: timeout_memory_leak(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1691:     {_DummyServerPid, Port} = otp_8739_dummy_server(),
 1692:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1693:     Request = {?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/dummy.html", []},
 1694:     Profile = ?config(profile, Config),
 1695:     case httpc:request(get, Request, [{connect_timeout, 500}, {timeout, 1}], [{sync, true}], Profile) of
 1696: 	{error, timeout} ->
 1697: 	    %% And now we check the size of the handler db
 1698: 	    Info = httpc:info(Profile),
 1699: 	    ct:log("Info: ~p", [Info]),
 1700: 	    {value, {handlers, Handlers}} =
 1701: 		lists:keysearch(handlers, 1, Info),
 1702: 	    case Handlers of
 1703: 		[] ->
 1704: 		    ok;
 1705: 		_ ->
 1706: 		    ct:fail({unexpected_handlers, Handlers})
 1707: 	    end;
 1708: 	Unexpected ->
 1709: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, Unexpected})
 1710:     end.
 1711: 
 1712: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1713: 
 1714: wait_for_whole_response() ->
 1715:     [{doc, "Check OTP-8154"}, {timetrap, timer:minutes(3)}].
 1716: wait_for_whole_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1717: 
 1718:      ReqSeqNumServer = start_sequence_number_server(),
 1719:      RespSeqNumServer = start_sequence_number_server(),
 1720:      {ok, Server, Port} = start_slow_server(RespSeqNumServer),
 1721:      Clients = run_clients(105, Port, ReqSeqNumServer),
 1722:      ok = wait4clients(Clients, timer:minutes(3)),
 1723:      Server ! shutdown,
 1724:      RespSeqNumServer ! shutdown,
 1725:      ReqSeqNumServer ! shutdown.
 1726: 
 1727: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1728: post_204_chunked() ->
 1729:     [{doc,"Test that chunked encoded 204 responses do not freeze the http client"}].
 1730: post_204_chunked(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1731:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 1732:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1733:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1734:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1735:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1736:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1737:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1738:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1739:         "\r\n",
 1740:     Chunk = "0\r\n\r\n",
 1741: 
 1742:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1743:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1744:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket,
 1745:                                   fun custom_receive/0) end),
 1746: 
 1747:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1748:     End = "/cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:post_204",
 1749:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End,
 1750:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1751:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "text/html", []}, [], [], Profile),
 1752:     timer:sleep(500),
 1753:     %% Second request times out in the faulty case.
 1754:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "text/html", []}, [], [], Profile).
 1755: 
 1756: custom_receive() ->
 1757:     receive
 1758:         {tcp, _, Msg} ->
 1759:             ct:log("Message received: ~p", [Msg])
 1760:     after
 1761:         1000 ->
 1762:             ct:fail("Timeout: did not receive packet")
 1763:     end.
 1764: 
 1765: %% Custom server is used to test special cases when using chunked encoding
 1766: custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket, ReceiveFun) ->
 1767:     {ok, Accept} = gen_tcp:accept(ListenSocket),
 1768:     ReceiveFun(),
 1769:     send_response(Msg, Chunk, Accept),
 1770:     custom_server_loop(Msg, Chunk, Accept, ReceiveFun).
 1771: 
 1772: custom_server_loop(Msg, Chunk, Accept, ReceiveFun) ->
 1773:     ReceiveFun(),
 1774:     send_response(Msg, Chunk, Accept),
 1775:     custom_server_loop(Msg, Chunk, Accept, ReceiveFun).
 1776: 
 1777: send_response(Msg, Chunk, Socket) ->
 1778:     inet:setopts(Socket, [{active, once}]),
 1779:     gen_tcp:send(Socket, Msg),
 1780:     timer:sleep(250),
 1781:     gen_tcp:send(Socket, Chunk).
 1782: 
 1783: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1784: head_chunked_empty_body() ->
 1785:     [{doc,"Test that HTTP responses (to HEAD requests) with 'Transfer-Encoding: chunked' and empty chunked-encoded body do not freeze the http client"}].
 1786: head_chunked_empty_body(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1787:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden\r\n" ++
 1788:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1789:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1790:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1791:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1792:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1793:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1794:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1795:         "\r\n",
 1796:     Chunk = "0\r\n\r\n",
 1797: 
 1798:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1799:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1800:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket,
 1801:                                   fun custom_receive/0) end),
 1802:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1803:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port),
 1804:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1805:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile),
 1806:     timer:sleep(500),
 1807:     %% Second request times out in the faulty case.
 1808:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile).
 1809: 
 1810: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1811: head_empty_body() ->
 1812:     [{doc,"Test that HTTP responses (to HEAD requests) with 'Transfer-Encoding: chunked' and empty body do not freeze the http client"}].
 1813: head_empty_body(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1814:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden\r\n" ++
 1815:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1816:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1817:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1818:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1819:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1820:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1821:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1822:         "\r\n",
 1823:     NoChunk = "", %% Do not chunk encode!
 1824: 
 1825:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1826:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1827:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, NoChunk, ListenSocket,
 1828:                                   fun custom_receive/0) end),
 1829:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1830:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port),
 1831:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1832:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile),
 1833:     timer:sleep(500),
 1834:     %% Second request times out in the faulty case.
 1835:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile).
 1836: 
 1837: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1838: chunkify_fun() ->
 1839:     [{doc,"Test that a chunked encoded request does not include the 'Content-Length header'"}].
 1840: chunkify_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1841:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 1842:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1843:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1844:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1845:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1846:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1847:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1848:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1849:         "\r\n",
 1850:     Chunk = "0\r\n\r\n",
 1851: 
 1852:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1853:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1854:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket,
 1855:                                   fun chunkify_receive/0) end),
 1856: 
 1857:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1858:     End = "/cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example",
 1859:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End,
 1860:     Fun = fun(_) -> {ok,<<1>>,eof_body} end,
 1861:     Acc = start,
 1862: 
 1863:     {ok, {{_,204,_}, _, _}} =
 1864:         httpc:request(put, {URL, [], "text/html", {chunkify, Fun, Acc}},
 1865:                       [], [], ?profile(Config)).
 1866: 
 1867: chunkify_receive() ->
 1868:     Error = "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++
 1869:         "Content-Length: 0\r\n\r\n",
 1870:     receive
 1871:         {tcp, Port, Msg} ->
 1872:             case binary:match(Msg, <<"content-length">>) of
 1873:                 nomatch ->
 1874:                     ct:log("Message received: ~s", [binary_to_list(Msg)]);
 1875:                 {_, _} ->
 1876:                     ct:log("Message received (negative): ~s", [binary_to_list(Msg)]),
 1877:                     %% Signal a testcase failure when the received HTTP request
 1878:                     %% contains a 'Content-Length' header.
 1879:                     gen_tcp:send(Port, Error),
 1880:                     ct:fail("Content-Length present in received headers.")
 1881:             end
 1882:     after
 1883:         1000 ->
 1884:             ct:fail("Timeout: did not receive packet")
 1885:     end.
 1886: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1887: stream_fun_server_close() ->
 1888:     [{doc, "Test that an error msg is received when using a receiver fun as stream target"}].
 1889: stream_fun_server_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1890:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/delay_close.html", Config), []},
 1891:     Self = self(),
 1892:     Fun = fun(X) -> Self ! X end,
 1893:     % Use the default proflie here as process_leak_on_keepalive depends on this case
 1894:     {ok, RequestId} = httpc:request(get, Request, [],
 1895:                                     [{sync, false}, {receiver, Fun}], ?profile(Config)),
 1896:     receive
 1897:         {RequestId, {error, Reason}} ->
 1898:             ct:log("Close ~p", [Reason]),
 1899:             ok
 1900:     after 13000 ->
 1901:             ct:fail(did_not_receive_close)
 1902:     end. 
 1903: 
 1904: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1905: server_closing_connection_on_first_response() ->
 1906:     [{doc, "Client receives \"Connection: close\" on first response."
 1907:       "A client that receives a \"close\" connection option MUST cease sending"
 1908:       "requests on that connection and close the connection after reading"
 1909:       "the response message containing the \"close\""}].
 1910: server_closing_connection_on_first_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1911:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1912:     ReqSrvSendOctFun =
 1913:         fun(V, U, S) ->
 1914:                 {ok, {{V, S, _}, Headers0, []}} =
 1915:                     httpc:request(get, {U, []}, [{version, V}], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),
 1916:                 {_, SendOctStr} =
 1917:                     proplists:lookup("x-socket-stat-send-oct", Headers0),
 1918:                 list_to_integer(SendOctStr)
 1919:         end,
 1920:     V = "HTTP/1.1",
 1921:     Url0 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct.html", Config),
 1922:     Url1 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct_and_connection_close.html", Config),
 1923:     %% Test case assumes at most one reusable past session.
 1924:     _ = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url1, 204),
 1925:     0 = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url0, 204),
 1926:     ok.
 1927: 
 1928: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1929: server_closing_connection_on_second_response() ->
 1930:     [{doc, "Client receives \"Connection: close\" on second response."
 1931:       "A client that receives a \"close\" connection option MUST cease sending"
 1932:       "requests on that connection and close the connection after reading"
 1933:       "the response message containing the \"close\""}].
 1934: server_closing_connection_on_second_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1935:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1936:     ReqSrvSendOctFun =
 1937:         fun(V, U, S) ->
 1938:                 {ok, {{V, S, _}, Headers0, []}} =
 1939:                     httpc:request(get, {U, []}, [{version, V}], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),
 1940:                 {_, SendOctStr} =
 1941:                     proplists:lookup("x-socket-stat-send-oct", Headers0),
 1942:                 list_to_integer(SendOctStr)
 1943:         end,
 1944:     V = "HTTP/1.1",
 1945:     Url0 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct.html", Config),
 1946:     Url1 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct_and_connection_close.html", Config),
 1947:     %% Test case assumes no reusable past sessions.
 1948:     SendOct0 = 0 = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url0, 204),
 1949:     case ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url1, 204) of SendOct1 when SendOct1 > SendOct0 -> ok end,
 1950:     0 = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url0, 204),
 1951:     ok.
 1952: 
 1953: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1954: slow_connection() ->
 1955:     [{doc, "Test that a request on a slow keep-alive connection won't crash the httpc_manager"}].
 1956: slow_connection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1957:     BodyFun = fun(0) -> eof;
 1958:                  (LenLeft) -> timer:sleep(1000),
 1959:                               {ok, lists:duplicate(10, "1"), LenLeft - 10}
 1960:               end,
 1961:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/httpc_SUITE:esi_post", Config),
 1962:                 [{"content-length", "100"}],
 1963:                 "text/plain",
 1964:                 {BodyFun, 100}},
 1965:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1966:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, Request, [], [], Profile),
 1967:     %% Second request causes a crash if gen_server timeout is not set to infinity
 1968:     %% in httpc_handler.
 1969:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, Request, [], [], Profile).
 1970: 
 1971: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1972: unix_domain_socket() ->
 1973:     [{doc, "Test HTTP requests over unix domain sockets"}].
 1974: unix_domain_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1975: 
 1976:     URL = "http:///v1/kv/foo",
 1977:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1978: 
 1979:     ct:log("Using profile ~w", [Profile]),
 1980:     {ok,[{unix_socket,?UNIX_SOCKET}]} =
 1981:         httpc:get_options([unix_socket], Profile),
 1982:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _}}
 1983: 	= httpc:request(put, {URL, [], [], ""}, [], [], Profile),
 1984:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _}}
 1985:         = httpc:request(get, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile).
 1986: 
 1987: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1988: delete_no_body() ->
 1989:     [{doc, "Test that a DELETE request without Body does not send a Content-Type header - Solves ERL-536"}].
 1990: delete_no_body(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1991:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/delete_no_body.html", Config),
 1992:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1993:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1994:     %% Simulated server replies 500 if 'Content-Type' header is present
 1995:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, _, _}} =
 1996:         httpc:request(delete, {URL, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1997:     {ok, {{_,500,_}, _, _}} =
 1998:         httpc:request(delete, {URL, [], "text/plain", "TEST"}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1999:                       RequestOpts, Profile).
 2000: 
 2001: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2002: post_with_content_type(doc) ->
 2003:     ["Test that a POST request with explicit 'Content-Type' does not drop the 'Content-Type' header - Solves ERL-736"];
 2004: post_with_content_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2005:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/delete_no_body.html", Config),
 2006:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 2007:     %% Simulated server replies 500 if 'Content-Type' header is present
 2008:     {ok, {{_,500,_}, _, _}} =
 2009:         httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "application/x-www-form-urlencoded", ""},
 2010:                       [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
 2011: 
 2012: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2013: request_options() ->
 2014:     [{require, ipv6_hosts},
 2015:      {doc, "Test http get request with socket options against local server (IPv6)"}].
 2016: request_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2017:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 2018:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 2019:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _ = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [],
 2020:                                                             [{socket_opts,[{ipfamily, inet6}]}],
 2021:                                                             Profile),
 2022:     {error,{failed_connect,_ }} = httpc:request(get, Request, [], [], Profile).
 2023: 
 2024: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2025: def_ssl_opt(_Config) ->
 2026:     CaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
 2027:     Ver = {verify, verify_peer},
 2028:     Certs = {cacerts, CaCerts},
 2029:     [Ver, Certs] = httpc:ssl_verify_host_options(false),
 2030:     [Ver, Certs | WildCard] = httpc:ssl_verify_host_options(true),
 2031:     [{customize_hostname_check, [{match_fun, _}]}] = WildCard,
 2032:     {'EXIT', _} = catch httpc:ssl_verify_host_options(other),
 2033:     ok.
 2034: 
 2035: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2036: remote_socket_close_parallel() ->
 2037:     [{doc,
 2038:       "Verify remote socket closure (related tickets: OTP-18509, OTP-18545,"
 2039:       "ERIERL-937). Transferred data size needs to be significant, so that "
 2040:       "socket is closed, in the middle of a transfer."
 2041:       "Note: test case is require good network and CPU - due to that "
 2042:       " it is not included in all()."}, {timetrap, timer:minutes(3)}].
 2043: remote_socket_close_parallel(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
 2044:     ClientNumber = 200,
 2045:     Config = [{iterations, 10} | Config0],
 2046:     ClientPids =
 2047:         [spawn(?MODULE, connect, [self(), [{client_id, Id} | Config]]) ||
 2048:             Id <- lists:seq(1, ClientNumber)],
 2049:     ct:log("Started ~p clients: ~w", [ClientNumber, ClientPids]),
 2050:     Receive = fun(S) ->
 2051:                       receive
 2052:                           ok ->
 2053:                               ct:log("++ Client finished (~p)", [S]),
 2054:                               ok;
 2055:                           Other ->
 2056:                               ct:fail(Other)
 2057:                       end
 2058:               end,
 2059:     [ok = Receive(S) || S <- lists:seq(1, ClientNumber)],
 2060:     ok.
 2061: 
 2062: connect(From, Config) ->
 2063:     From ! loop(?config(iterations, Config),
 2064:                 io_lib:format("C~p|", [?config(client_id, Config)]),
 2065:                 Config).
 2066: 
 2067: loop(0, Acc, _Config) ->
 2068:     ct:log("~n~s|", [Acc]),
 2069:     ok;
 2070: loop(Cnt, Acc, Config) ->
 2071:     case request(Config) of
 2072:         {ok, {{_,200,"OK"}, _, _}} ->
 2073:             case process_info(self(), message_queue_len) of
 2074:                 {message_queue_len,0} ->
 2075:                     loop(Cnt-1, Acc ++ ".", Config);
 2076:                 _ ->
 2077:                     %% queue is expected to be empty
 2078:                     queue_check(),
 2079:                     ct:log("~n~s|", [Acc ++ "x"]),
 2080:                     fail
 2081:             end;
 2082:         {ok, NotOk} ->
 2083:             ct:log("200 OK was not received~n~p", [NotOk]),
 2084:             fail;
 2085:         Error ->
 2086:             ct:log("Error: ~p",[Error]),
 2087:             fail
 2088:     end.
 2089: 
 2090: queue_check() ->
 2091:     receive
 2092:         {http, {ReqId, {_Result, _Head, Data}}} when is_binary(Data) ->
 2093:             ct:log("Unexpected data received: ~p ",
 2094:                       [ReqId]),
 2095:             queue_check();
 2096:         X ->
 2097:             ct:log("Caught unexpected something else: ~p",[X]),
 2098:             queue_check()
 2099:     after 5000 ->
 2100:             done
 2101:     end.
 2102: 
 2103: request(Config) ->
 2104:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/httpc_SUITE/foo", Config), []},
 2105:     httpc:request(get, Request, [],[{sync,true}, {body_format,binary}], ?profile(Config)).
 2106: 
 2107: foo(SID, _Env, _Input) ->
 2108:     EightyMillionBits = 80000000, %% ~10MB transferred
 2109:     mod_esi:deliver(SID, [<<0:EightyMillionBits>>]).
 2110: 
 2111: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2112: %% Internal Functions ------------------------------------------------
 2113: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2114: stream(ReceiverPid, Receiver, Config) ->
 2115:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 2116:     Options     = [{sync, false}, {receiver, Receiver}],
 2117:     {ok, RequestId} =
 2118: 	 httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], Options, ?profile(Config)),
 2119:      Body =
 2120: 	 receive
 2121: 	     {reply, ReceiverPid, {RequestId, {{_, 200, _}, _, B}}} ->
 2122: 		 B;
 2123: 	     {reply, ReceiverPid, Msg} ->
 2124: 		 ct:fail(Msg);
 2125: 	     {bad_reply, ReceiverPid, Msg} ->
 2126: 		 ct:fail(Msg)
 2127: 	 end,
 2128: 
 2129:      inets_test_lib:check_body(binary_to_list(Body)).
 2130: 
 2131: create_receiver(Type) ->
 2132:     Parent = self(),
 2133:     Receiver = fun() -> receiver(Type, Parent) end,
 2134:     spawn_link(Receiver).
 2135: 
 2136: stop_receiver(Pid) ->
 2137:     Pid ! {stop, self()}.
 2138: 
 2139: receiver(Type, Parent) ->
 2140:     receive
 2141: 	{stop, Parent} ->
 2142: 	    ok;
 2143: 	{http, ReplyInfo} when (Type =:= pid) ->
 2144: 	    Parent ! {reply, self(), ReplyInfo},
 2145: 	    receiver(Type, Parent);
 2146: 
 2147: 	{Type, ReplyInfo} ->
 2148: 	    Parent ! {reply, self(), ReplyInfo},
 2149: 	    receiver(Type, Parent);
 2150: 
 2151: 	Crap ->
 2152: 	    Parent ! {reply, self(), {bad_reply, Crap}},
 2153: 	    receiver(Type, Parent)
 2154:     end.
 2155: 
 2156: stream_deliver_fun(ReceiverPid) ->
 2157:     fun(ReplyInfo) -> stream_deliver(ReplyInfo, function, ReceiverPid) end.
 2158: 
 2159: stream_deliver(ReplyInfo, Type, ReceiverPid) ->
 2160:     ReceiverPid ! {Type, ReplyInfo},
 2161:     ok.
 2162: 
 2163: stream_test(Request, To, RequestOpts, Profile) ->
 2164:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body}} =
 2165: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 2166:     {ok, RequestId} =
 2167: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}, To | RequestOpts], Profile),
 2168: 
 2169:     StreamedBody =
 2170: 	receive
 2171: 	    {http, {RequestId, stream_start, _Headers}} ->
 2172: 		receive_streamed_body(RequestId, <<>>);
 2173: 	    {http, {RequestId, stream_start, _Headers, Pid}}  ->
 2174: 		receive_streamed_body(RequestId, <<>>, Pid);
 2175: 	    {http, Msg} ->
 2176: 		ct:fail(Msg)
 2177: 	end,
 2178: 
 2179:     Body = binary_to_list(StreamedBody).
 2180: 
 2181: not_streamed_test(Request, To, RequestOpts, Profile) ->
 2182:     {ok, {{_,Code,_}, [_ | _], Body}} =
 2183: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 2184:                       [{body_format, binary} | RequestOpts], Profile),
 2185:     {ok, RequestId} =
 2186: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 2187:                       [{body_format, binary}, {sync, false}, To | RequestOpts], Profile),
 2188: 
 2189:     receive
 2190: 	{http, {RequestId, {{_, Code, _}, _Headers, Body}}} ->
 2191: 	    {Code, binary_to_list(Body)};
 2192: 	{http, Msg} ->
 2193: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
 2194:     end.
 2195: 
 2196: url(Group, End, Config) when Group == http;
 2197:                              Group == sim_http;
 2198:                              Group == sim_http_process_leak;
 2199:                              Group == http_internal;
 2200:                              Group == http_internal_minimum_bytes ->
 2201:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2202:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 2203:     ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2204: url(Group, End, Config) when Group == http_ipv6;
 2205:                              Group == sim_http_ipv6 ->
 2206:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2207:     ?URL_START ++ "[::1]" ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2208: url(Group, End, Config) when Group == https;
 2209:                              Group == sim_https ->
 2210:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2211:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 2212:     ?TLS_URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End.
 2213: 
 2214: url(Group, UserInfo, End, Config) when Group == http;
 2215:                                        Group == sim_http;
 2216:                                        Group == sim_http_process_leak ->
 2217:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2218:     {ok, Hostname} = inet:gethostname(),
 2219:     ?URL_START ++ UserInfo ++ "@" ++ Hostname ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2220: url(sim_http_ipv6, UserInfo, End, Config) ->
 2221:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2222:     ?URL_START ++ UserInfo ++ "@" ++ "[::1]:" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2223: url(Group, UserInfo, End, Config) when Group == https;
 2224:                                        Group == sim_https ->
 2225:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2226:     {ok, Hostname} = inet:gethostname(),
 2227:     ?TLS_URL_START ++ UserInfo ++ "@" ++ Hostname ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End.
 2228: 
 2229: % Only for use in the `mixed` test group, where both http and https
 2230: % URLs are possible.
 2231: mixed_url(http, End, Config) ->
 2232:     mixed_url(http_port, End, Config);
 2233: mixed_url(https, End, Config) ->
 2234:     mixed_url(https_port, End, Config);
 2235: mixed_url(PortType, End, Config) ->
 2236:     Port = proplists:get_value(PortType, Config),
 2237:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 2238:     Start = case PortType of
 2239:         http_port -> ?URL_START;
 2240:         https_port -> ?TLS_URL_START
 2241:     end,
 2242:     Start ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End.
 2243: 
 2244: group_name(Config) ->
 2245:     GroupProp = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
 2246:     proplists:get_value(name, GroupProp).
 2247: 
 2248: server_start(Group, _) when Group == sim_http; Group == sim_http_process_leak ->
 2249:     Inet = inet_version(),
 2250:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, Inet},{unix_socket, undefined}]),
 2251:     {_Pid, Port} = http_test_lib:dummy_server(ip_comm, Inet, [{content_cb, ?MODULE}]),
 2252:     Port;
 2253: 
 2254: server_start(sim_http_ipv6, _) ->
 2255:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, inet6},{unix_socket, undefined}]),
 2256:     {_Pid, Port} = http_test_lib:dummy_server(ip_comm, inet6, [{content_cb, ?MODULE}]),
 2257:     Port;
 2258: 
 2259: server_start(sim_https, SslConfig) ->
 2260:     Inet = inet_version(),
 2261:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, Inet},{unix_socket, undefined}]),
 2262:     {_Pid, Port} = http_test_lib:dummy_server(ssl, Inet, [{ssl, SslConfig}, {content_cb, ?MODULE}]),
 2263:     Port;
 2264: 
 2265: server_start(http_unix_socket, Config) ->
 2266:     Inet = local,
 2267:     Socket = proplists:get_value(unix_socket, Config),
 2268:     HttpcOptions = [{ipfamily, Inet},{unix_socket, Socket}],
 2269:     {Pid, Port} = http_test_lib:dummy_server(unix_socket, Inet, [{content_cb, ?MODULE},
 2270:                                                                   {unix_socket, Socket}]),
 2271:     {Pid, Port, HttpcOptions};
 2272: server_start(http_ipv6, HttpdConfig) ->
 2273:     {ok, Pid} = inets:start(httpd, HttpdConfig),
 2274:     Serv = inets:services_info(),
 2275:     {value, {_, _, Info}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Serv),
 2276:     proplists:get_value(port, Info);
 2277: server_start(sim_mixed, Config) ->
 2278:     % For the mixed http/https case, we start two servers and return both ports.
 2279:     {server_start(sim_http, []), server_start(sim_https, Config)};
 2280: server_start(_, HttpdConfig) ->
 2281:     {ok, Pid} = inets:start(httpd, HttpdConfig),
 2282:     Serv = inets:services_info(),
 2283:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, inet_version()},{unix_socket, undefined}]),
 2284:     {value, {_, _, Info}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Serv),
 2285:     proplists:get_value(port, Info).
 2286: 
 2287: server_config(base, Config) ->
 2288:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2289:     [{port, 0},
 2290:      {server_name,"httpc_test"},
 2291:      {server_root, ServerRoot},
 2292:      {document_root, proplists:get_value(doc_root, Config)},
 2293:      {mime_type, "text/plain"}];
 2294: server_config(base_http, Config) ->
 2295:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2296:     server_config(base, Config) ++
 2297:         [{script_alias,
 2298:           {"/cgi-bin/", filename:join(ServerRoot, "cgi-bin") ++ "/"}}];
 2299: server_config(http, Config) ->
 2300:     server_config(base_http, Config) ++
 2301:         [{bind_address, any},
 2302:          {ipfamily, inet_version()}];
 2303: server_config(http_ipv6, Config) ->
 2304:     server_config(base_http, Config) ++
 2305:         [{bind_address, {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1}},
 2306:          {ipfamily, inet6}];
 2307: server_config(http_internal, Config) ->
 2308:     server_config(http, Config) ++
 2309:         [{erl_script_alias, {"", [httpc_SUITE]}}];
 2310: server_config(http_internal_minimum_bytes, Config) ->
 2311:     server_config(http_internal, Config) ++
 2312:         [{minimum_bytes_per_second, 100}];
 2313: server_config(https, Config) ->
 2314:     [{socket_type, {ssl, ssl_config(Config)}} | server_config(http, Config)];
 2315: server_config(sim_https, Config) ->
 2316:     ssl_config(Config);
 2317: server_config(http_unix_socket, _Config) ->
 2318:     Socket = ?UNIX_SOCKET,
 2319:     [{unix_socket, Socket}];
 2320: server_config(_, _) ->
 2321:     [].
 2322: 
 2323: esi_post(Sid, _Env, _Input) ->
 2324:     mod_esi:deliver(Sid, ["OK"]).
 2325: 
 2326: start_apps(https) ->
 2327:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([crypto, public_key, ssl]);
 2328: start_apps(sim_https) ->
 2329:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([crypto, public_key, ssl]);
 2330: start_apps(sim_mixed) ->
 2331:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([crypto, public_key, ssl]);
 2332: start_apps(_) ->
 2333:     ok.
 2334: 
 2335: ssl_config(Config) ->
 2336:     SSLConf = proplists:get_value(ssl_conf, Config),
 2337:     proplists:get_value(server_config, SSLConf).
 2338: 
 2339: setup_server_dirs(ServerRoot, DocRoot, DataDir) ->   
 2340:     CgiDir =  filename:join(ServerRoot, "cgi-bin"),
 2341:     ok = file:make_dir(ServerRoot),
 2342:     ok = file:make_dir(DocRoot),
 2343:     ok = file:make_dir(CgiDir),
 2344: 
 2345:     {ok, Files} = file:list_dir(DataDir),
 2346:     
 2347:     lists:foreach(fun(File) -> case lists:suffix(".html", File) of
 2348: 				   true ->
 2349: 				       inets_test_lib:copy_file(File, 
 2350: 								DataDir, 
 2351: 								DocRoot);
 2352: 				   false ->
 2353: 				       ok
 2354: 			       end
 2355: 		  end, Files),
 2356:     
 2357:     Cgi = case os:type() of
 2358: 	      {win32, _} ->
 2359: 		  "cgi_echo.exe";
 2360: 	      _ ->
 2361: 		  "cgi_echo"
 2362: 	  end,
 2363:     
 2364:     {ok, _} = inets_test_lib:copy_file(Cgi, DataDir, CgiDir),
 2365:     AbsCgi = filename:join([CgiDir, Cgi]),
 2366:     {ok, FileInfo} = file:read_file_info(AbsCgi),
 2367:     ok = file:write_file_info(AbsCgi, FileInfo#file_info{mode = 8#00755}).
 2368: 
 2369: 
 2370: keep_alive_requests(Request, Profile) ->
 2371:     {ok, RequestIdA0} =
 2372: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2373:     {ok, RequestIdA1} =
 2374: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2375:     {ok, RequestIdA2} =
 2376: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2377: 
 2378:     receive_replys([RequestIdA0, RequestIdA1, RequestIdA2]),
 2379: 
 2380:     {ok, RequestIdB0} =
 2381: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2382:     {ok, RequestIdB1} =
 2383: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2384:     {ok, RequestIdB2} =
 2385: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2386: 
 2387:     ok = httpc:cancel_request(RequestIdB1, Profile),
 2388:     ct:log("Cancel ~p~n", [RequestIdB1]),
 2389:     receive_replys([RequestIdB0, RequestIdB2]).
 2390: 
 2391: receive_replys([]) ->
 2392:     ok;
 2393: receive_replys([ID|IDs]) ->
 2394:     receive
 2395: 	{http, {ID, {{_, 200, _}, [_|_], _}}} ->
 2396: 	    receive_replys(IDs);
 2397: 	{http, {Other, {{_, 200, _}, [_|_], _}}} ->
 2398: 	    ct:log("~p",[{recived_canceld_id, Other}])
 2399:     end.
 2400: 
 2401: inet_version() ->
 2402:     inet. %% Just run inet for now
 2403:     %% case gen_tcp:listen(0,[inet6]) of
 2404:     %% 	{ok, S} ->
 2405:     %% 	    gen_tcp:close(S),
 2406:     %% 	    inet6;
 2407:     %% 	_ ->
 2408:     %% 	    inet
 2409:     %%end.
 2410: 
 2411: handle_request(Module, Function, Args, Socket) ->
 2412:     case Module:Function(Args) of
 2413: 	{ok, Result} ->
 2414: 	    case handle_http_msg(Result, Socket, []) of
 2415: 		stop ->
 2416: 		    stop;
 2417: 		<<>> ->
 2418: 		    {httpd_request, parse, [[{max_uri,?HTTP_MAX_URI_SIZE},
 2419: 					     {max_header, ?HTTP_MAX_HEADER_SIZE},
 2420: 					     {max_version,?HTTP_MAX_VERSION_STRING}, 
 2421: 					     {max_method, ?HTTP_MAX_METHOD_STRING},
 2422: 					     {max_content_length, ?HTTP_MAX_CONTENT_LENGTH},
 2423: 					     {customize, httpd_custom}
 2424: 					    ]]};
 2425: 		Data ->	
 2426: 		    handle_request(httpd_request, parse, 
 2427: 				   [Data, [{max_uri,    ?HTTP_MAX_URI_SIZE},
 2428: 					   {max_header, ?HTTP_MAX_HEADER_SIZE},
 2429: 					    {max_version,?HTTP_MAX_VERSION_STRING}, 
 2430: 					    {max_method, ?HTTP_MAX_METHOD_STRING},
 2431: 					    {max_content_length, ?HTTP_MAX_CONTENT_LENGTH},
 2432: 					   {customize, httpd_custom}
 2433: 					  ]], Socket)
 2434: 	    end;
 2435: 	NewMFA ->
 2436: 	    NewMFA
 2437:     end.
 2438: 
 2439: handle_http_msg({Method, RelUri, _, {_, Headers}, Body}, Socket, _) ->
 2440:     ct:log("Request: ~p ~p", [Method, RelUri]),
 2441: 
 2442:     NextRequest = 
 2443: 	case RelUri of
 2444: 	    "/dummy_headers.html" ->
 2445: 		<<>>;
 2446: 	    "/no_headers.html" ->
 2447: 		stop;
 2448: 	    "/just_close.html" ->
 2449: 		stop;
 2450: 	    _ ->
 2451: 		ContentLength = content_length(Headers),    
 2452: 		case byte_size(Body) - ContentLength of
 2453: 		    0 ->
 2454: 			<<>>;
 2455: 		    _ ->
 2456: 			<<_BodyThisReq:ContentLength/binary, 
 2457: 			  Next/binary>> = Body,
 2458: 			Next
 2459: 		end
 2460: 	end,
 2461:    
 2462:     case global:trans({cookies, verify}, fun() -> unset end, [node()], 0) of
 2463:         aborted->
 2464:             % somebody has the lock and wants us to check
 2465:             check_cookie(Headers);
 2466:         unset ->
 2467:             ok
 2468:     end,
 2469: 
 2470:    {ok, {_, Port}} = sockname(Socket),
 2471: 
 2472: 
 2473:     DefaultResponse = "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2474: 	"Content-Length:32\r\n\r\n"
 2475: 	"<HTML><BODY>foobar</BODY></HTML>",
 2476: 
 2477:     Msg = handle_uri(Method,RelUri, Port, Headers, Socket, DefaultResponse),
 2478: 
 2479:     case Msg of
 2480: 	ok ->
 2481: 	    ok;
 2482: 	close ->
 2483: 	    %% Nothing to send, just close
 2484: 	    close(Socket);
 2485: 	_ when is_list(Msg) orelse is_binary(Msg) ->
 2486: 	    case Msg of
 2487: 		[] ->
 2488: 		    ct:log("Empty Msg", []);
 2489: 		_ ->
 2490: 		    ct:log("Response: ~p", [Msg]),
 2491: 		    send(Socket, Msg)
 2492: 	    end
 2493:     end,
 2494:     NextRequest.
 2495: 
 2496: ensure_host_header_with_port([]) ->
 2497:     false;
 2498: ensure_host_header_with_port([{"host", Host}| _]) ->
 2499:     case string:tokens(Host, [$:]) of
 2500: 	[_ActualHost, _Port] ->
 2501: 	    true;
 2502: 	_ ->
 2503: 	    false
 2504:     end;
 2505: ensure_host_header_with_port([_|T]) ->
 2506:     ensure_host_header_with_port(T).
 2507: 
 2508: auth_header([]) ->
 2509:     auth_header_not_found;
 2510: auth_header([{"authorization", Value} | _]) ->
 2511:     {ok, string:strip(Value)};
 2512: auth_header([_ | Tail]) ->
 2513:     auth_header(Tail).
 2514: 
 2515: content_type_header([]) ->
 2516:     not_found;
 2517: content_type_header([{"content-type", Value}|_]) ->
 2518:     {ok, string:strip(Value)};
 2519: content_type_header([_|T]) ->
 2520:     content_type_header(T).
 2521: 
 2522: handle_auth("Basic " ++ UserInfo, Challenge, DefaultResponse) ->
 2523:     case string:tokens(base64:decode_to_string(UserInfo), ":") of
 2524: 	["alladin", "sesame"] = Auth ->
 2525: 	    ct:log("Auth: ~p~n", [Auth]),
 2526: 	    DefaultResponse;
 2527: 	Other ->
 2528: 	    ct:log("UnAuth: ~p~n", [Other]),
 2529: 	    Challenge
 2530:     end.
 2531: 
 2532: check_cookie([]) ->
 2533:     ct:fail(no_cookie_header);
 2534: check_cookie([{"cookie", _} | _]) ->
 2535:     ok;
 2536: check_cookie([_Head | Tail]) ->
 2537:    check_cookie(Tail).
 2538: 
 2539: content_length([]) ->
 2540:     0;
 2541: content_length([{"content-length", Value}|_]) ->
 2542:     list_to_integer(string:strip(Value));
 2543: content_length([_Head | Tail]) ->
 2544:    content_length(Tail).
 2545: 
 2546: handle_uri("GET","/dummy.html?foo=bar",_,_,_,_) ->
 2547:     "HTTP/1.0 200 OK\r\n\r\nTEST";
 2548: 
 2549: handle_uri("GET","/space%20.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2550:     Body = "<HTML><BODY>foobar</BODY></HTML>",
 2551:     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n" ++
 2552:         "Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body)) ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++
 2553:         Body;
 2554: 
 2555: handle_uri(_,"/just_close.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2556: 		close;
 2557: handle_uri(_,"/no_content.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2558:     "HTTP/1.0 204 No Content\r\n\r\n";
 2559: 
 2560: handle_uri(_,"/no_headers.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2561:     "HTTP/1.0 200 OK\r\n\r\nTEST";
 2562: 
 2563: handle_uri("TRACE","/trace.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2564:     Body = "TRACE /trace.html simulate HTTP TRACE ",
 2565:     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n" ++ "Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body)) ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ Body;
 2566: 
 2567: handle_uri(_,"/ensure_host_header_with_port.html",_,Headers,_,_) ->
 2568:     case ensure_host_header_with_port(Headers) of
 2569: 	true ->
 2570: 	    B =
 2571: 		"<HTML><BODY>" ++
 2572: 		"host with port" ++
 2573: 		"</BODY></HTML>",
 2574: 	    Len = integer_to_list(length(B)),
 2575: 	    "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2576: 		"Content-Length:" ++ Len ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ B;
 2577: 	false ->
 2578: 	    B =
 2579: 		"<HTML><BODY>" ++
 2580: 		"Internal Server Error - host without port" ++
 2581: 		"</BODY></HTML>",
 2582: 	    Len = integer_to_list(length(B)),
 2583: 	    "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++
 2584: 		"Content-Length:" ++ Len ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ B
 2585:     end;
 2586: handle_uri(_,"/redirect_ensure_host_header_with_port.html",Port,_,Socket,_) ->
 2587:     NewUri = url_start(Socket) ++
 2588: 	integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/ensure_host_header_with_port.html",
 2589:     "HTTP/1.1 302 Found \r\n" ++
 2590: 	"Location:" ++ NewUri ++  "\r\n" ++
 2591: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n";
 2592:

 2596:   Body = "<HTML><BODY><a href=" ++ NewUri ++
 2597: 	">New place</a></BODY></HTML>",
 2598:     "HTTP/1.1 300 Multiple Choices\r\n" ++
 2599: 	"Location:" ++ NewUri ++  "\r\n" ++
 2600: 	"Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body))
 2601: 	++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ Body;

 2714: handle_uri(_,"/404.html",_,_,_,_) ->

 2719: handle_uri(_,"/500.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2720:     "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++
 2721: 	"Content-Length:47\r\n\r\n" ++
 2722: 	"<HTML><BODY>Internal Server Error</BODY></HTML>";
 2723: 
 2724: handle_uri(_,"/503.html",_,_,_,DefaultResponse) ->
 2725:     case ets:lookup(unavailable, 503) of
 2726: 	[{503, unavailable}] ->
 2727: 	    ets:insert(unavailable, {503, available}),
 2728: 	    "HTTP/1.1 503 Service Unavailable\r\n" ++
 2729: 		"Retry-After:5\r\n" ++
 2730: 		"Content-Length:47\r\n\r\n" ++
 2731: 		"<HTML><BODY>Internal Server Error</BODY></HTML>";
 2732: 	[{503, available}]   ->
 2733: 	    DefaultResponse;
 2734: 	[{503, long_unavailable}]  ->
 2735: 	    "HTTP/1.1 503 Service Unavailable\r\n" ++
 2736: 		"Retry-After:120\r\n" ++
 2737: 		"Content-Length:47\r\n\r\n" ++
 2738: 		"<HTML><BODY>Internal Server Error</BODY></HTML>"
 2739:     end;
 2740: 
 2741: handle_uri(_,"/redirectloop.html",Port,_,Socket,_) ->
 2742:     %% Create a potential endless loop!
 2743:     NewUri = url_start(Socket) ++
 2744: 	integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/redirectloop.html",
 2745:      Body = "<HTML><BODY><a href=" ++ NewUri ++
 2746: 	">New place</a></BODY></HTML>",
 2747:     "HTTP/1.1 300 Multiple Choices\r\n" ++
 2748: 	"Location:" ++ NewUri ++  "\r\n" ++
 2749: 	"Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body))
 2750: 	++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ Body;
 2751: 
 2752: handle_uri(_,"/userinfo.html", _,Headers,_, DefaultResponse) ->
 2753:     Challenge = "HTTP/1.1 401 Unauthorized \r\n" ++
 2754: 	"WWW-Authenticate:Basic" ++"\r\n" ++
 2755: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n",
 2756:     case auth_header(Headers) of
 2757: 	{ok, Value} ->
 2758: 	    handle_auth(Value, Challenge, DefaultResponse);
 2759: 	_ ->
 2760: 	    Challenge
 2761:     end;
 2762: 
 2763: handle_uri(_,"/dummy_headers.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2764:     %% The client will only care about the Transfer-Encoding
 2765:     %% header the rest of these headers are left to the
 2766:     %% user to evaluate. This is not a valid response
 2767:     %% it only tests that the header handling code works.
 2768:     Head = "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2769: 	"Pragma:1#no-cache\r\n"  ++
 2770: 	"Via:1.0 fred, 1.1 nowhere.com (Apache/1.1)\r\n"  ++
 2771: 	"Warning:1#pseudonym foobar\r\n"  ++
 2772: 	"Vary:*\r\n"  ++
 2773: 	"Trailer:Other:inets_test\r\n"  ++
 2774: 	"Upgrade:HTTP/2.0\r\n"  ++
 2775: 	"Age:4711\r\n" ++
 2776: 	"Transfer-Encoding:chunked\r\n" ++
 2777: 	"Content-Encoding:foo\r\n" ++
 2778: 	"Content-Language:en\r\n"  ++
 2779: 	"Content-Location:http://www.foobar.se\r\n"  ++
 2780: 	"Content-MD5:104528739076276072743283077410617235478\r\n"
 2781: 	++
 2782: 	"Content-Range:Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT\r\n"  ++
 2783: 	"Expires:Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT\r\n"  ++
 2784: 	"Proxy-Authenticate:#1Basic"  ++
 2785: 	"\r\n\r\n",
 2786:     send(Socket, Head),
 2787:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("<HTML><BODY>fo")),
 2788:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("obar</BODY></HTML>")),
 2789:     http_chunk:encode_last();
 2790:

 2793:     "Content-Length:5\r\n"
 2794:     "Folded: a\r\n"

 2796:     "Hello";

 2896: handle_uri(_,"/http_1_0_no_length_multiple.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2897:     Head = "HTTP/1.0 200 ok\r\n"
 2898:         "Content-type:text/plain\r\n\r\n"
 2899:         "multiple packets, ",
 2900:     send(Socket, Head),
 2901:     %% long body to make sure it will be sent in multiple tcp packets
 2902:     send(Socket, string:copies("other multiple packets ", 200)),
 2903:     close(Socket);
 2904: 
 2905: handle_uri(_,"/large_404_response.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2906:     %% long body to make sure it will be sent in multiple tcp packets
 2907:     Body = string:copies("other multiple packets ", 200),
 2908:     Head = io_lib:format("HTTP/1.1 404 not found\r\n"
 2909:                          "Content-length: ~B\r\n"
 2910:                          "Content-type: text/plain\r\n\r\n",
 2911:                          [length(Body)]),
 2912:     send(Socket, Head),
 2913:     send(Socket, Body),
 2914:     close(Socket);
 2915: 
 2916: handle_uri(_,"/once.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2917:     Head =  "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2918: 	"Content-Length:32\r\n\r\n",
 2919:     send(Socket, Head),
 2920:     send(Socket, "<HTML><BODY>fo"),
 2921:     ct:sleep(1000),
 2922:     send(Socket, "ob"),
 2923:     ct:sleep(1000),
 2924:     send(Socket, "ar</BODY></HTML>");
 2925: 
 2926: handle_uri(_,"/invalid_http.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2927:     "HTTP/1.1 301\r\nDate:Sun, 09 Dec 2007 13:04:18 GMT\r\n" ++
 2928: 	"Transfer-Encoding:chunked\r\n\r\n";
 2929: 
 2930: handle_uri(_,"/invalid_chunk_size.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2931:     "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2932: 	"Transfer-Encoding:chunked\r\n\r\n\r\n";
 2933: 
 2934: handle_uri(_,"/missing_reason_phrase.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2935:     "HTTP/1.1 200\r\n" ++
 2936: 	"Content-Length: 32\r\n\r\n"
 2937: 	"<HTML><BODY>foobar</BODY></HTML>";
 2938: 
 2939: handle_uri(_,"/missing_CR.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2940:     "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\n" ++
 2941: 	"Content-Length:32\r\n\n" ++
 2942: 	"<HTML><BODY>foobar</BODY></HTML>";
 2943: 
 2944: handle_uri(_,"/multipart_chunks.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2945:     Head = "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2946: 	"Transfer-Encoding:chunked\r\n" ++
 2947: 	"Date: " ++ httpd_util:rfc1123_date() ++ "\r\n"
 2948: 	"Connection: Keep-Alive\r\n" ++
 2949: 	"Content-Type: multipart/x-mixed-replace; boundary=chunk_boundary\r\n" ++
 2950: 	"\r\n",
 2951:     send(Socket, Head),
 2952:     send_multipart_chunks(Socket),
 2953:     http_chunk:encode_last();
 2954: handle_uri(_,"/delay_close.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2955:     ct:sleep(10000),
 2956:     close(Socket);
 2957: handle_uri("HEAD",_,_,_,_,_) ->
 2958:     "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2959: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n";
 2960: handle_uri("PUT","/v1/kv/foo",_,_,_,_) ->
 2961:     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n" ++
 2962:         "Date: Tue, 20 Feb 2018 14:39:08 GMT\r\n" ++
 2963:         "Content-Length: 5\r\n\r\n" ++
 2964:         "Content-Type: application/json\r\n\r\n" ++
 2965:         "true\n";
 2966: handle_uri("GET","/v1/kv/foo",_,_,_,_) ->
 2967:     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n" ++
 2968:         "Date: Tue, 20 Feb 2018 14:39:08 GMT\r\n" ++
 2969:         "Content-Length: 24\r\n" ++
 2970:         "Content-Type: application/json\r\n\r\n" ++
 2971:         "[{\"Value\": \"aGVsbG8=\"}]\n";
 2972: handle_uri(_,"/http_1_1_send_oct.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2973:     "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 2974:         "X-Socket-Stat-Send-Oct: " ++ integer_to_list(get_stat(Socket, send_oct)) ++ "\r\n" ++
 2975:         "\r\n";
 2976: handle_uri(_,"/http_1_1_send_oct_and_connection_close.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2977:     "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 2978:         "X-Socket-Stat-Send-Oct: " ++ integer_to_list(get_stat(Socket, send_oct)) ++ "\r\n" ++
 2979:         "Connection: close\r\n" ++
 2980:         "\r\n";
 2981: handle_uri(_,"/delete_no_body.html", _,Headers,_, DefaultResponse) ->
 2982:     Error = "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++
 2983: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n",
 2984:     case content_type_header(Headers) of
 2985: 	{ok, _} ->
 2986: 	    Error;
 2987: 	not_found ->
 2988: 	    DefaultResponse
 2989:     end;
 2990: handle_uri(_,_,_,_,_,DefaultResponse) ->
 2991:     DefaultResponse.
 2992: 
 2993: get_stat(S, Opt) ->
 2994:     case getstat(S, [Opt]) of
 2995:         {ok, [{Opt, V}]} when is_integer(V) ->
 2996:             V;
 2997:         {error, _} = E ->
 2998:             E
 2999:     end.
 3000: 
 3001: getstat(#sslsocket{} = S, Opts) ->
 3002:     ssl:getstat(S, Opts);
 3003: getstat(S, Opts) ->
 3004:     inet:getstat(S, Opts).
 3005: 
 3006: url_start(#sslsocket{}) ->
 3007:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 3008:     ?TLS_URL_START ++ Host ++ ":";
 3009: url_start(_) ->
 3010:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 3011:     ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":".
 3012: 
 3013: send(#sslsocket{} = S, Msg) ->
 3014:     ssl:send(S, Msg);
 3015: send(S, Msg) ->
 3016:     gen_tcp:send(S, Msg).
 3017: 
 3018: close(#sslsocket{} = S) ->
 3019:     ssl:close(S);
 3020: close(S) ->
 3021:     gen_tcp:close(S).
 3022: 
 3023: sockname(#sslsocket{}= S) ->
 3024:     ssl:sockname(S);
 3025: sockname(S) ->
 3026:     inet:sockname(S).
 3027: 
 3028: receive_streamed_body(RequestId, Body) ->
 3029:     receive
 3030: 	{http, {RequestId, stream, BinBodyPart}} ->
 3031: 	    receive_streamed_body(RequestId,
 3032: 				  <<Body/binary, BinBodyPart/binary>>);
 3033: 	{http, {RequestId, stream_end, _Headers}} ->
 3034: 	    Body;
 3035: 	{http, Msg} ->
 3036: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
 3037:     end.
 3038: 
 3039: receive_streamed_body(RequestId, Body, Pid) ->
 3040:     httpc:stream_next(Pid),
 3041:     ct:log("~p:receive_streamed_body -> requested next stream ~n", [?MODULE]),
 3042:     receive
 3043: 	{http, {RequestId, stream, BinBodyPart}} ->
 3044: 	    %% Make sure the httpc hasn't sent us the next 'stream'
 3045: 	    %% without our request.
 3046: 	    receive
 3047: 		{http, {RequestId, stream, _}} = Msg ->
 3048: 		    ct:fail({unexpected_flood_of_stream, Msg})
 3049: 	    after
 3050: 		1000 ->
 3051: 		    ok
 3052: 	    end,
 3053: 	    receive_streamed_body(RequestId,
 3054: 				  <<Body/binary, BinBodyPart/binary>>,
 3055: 				  Pid);
 3056: 	{http, {RequestId, stream_end, _Headers}} ->
 3057: 	    Body;
 3058: 	{http, Msg} ->
 3059: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
 3060:     end.
 3061: 
 3062: %% -----------------------------------------------------
 3063: %% A sequence number handler
 3064: %% The purpose is to be able to pair requests with responses.
 3065: 
 3066: start_sequence_number_server() ->
 3067:     proc_lib:spawn(fun() -> loop_sequence_number(1) end).
 3068: 
 3069: loop_sequence_number(N) ->
 3070:     receive
 3071: 	shutdown ->
 3072: 	    ok;
 3073: 	{From, get_next} ->
 3074: 	    From ! {next_is, N},
 3075: 	    loop_sequence_number(N + 1)
 3076:     end.
 3077: 
 3078: get_next_sequence_number(SeqNumServer) ->
 3079:     SeqNumServer ! {self(), get_next},
 3080:     receive {next_is, N} -> N end.
 3081: 
 3082: %% -----------------------------------------------------
 3083: %% Client part
 3084: %% Sends requests randomly parallel
 3085: 
 3086: run_clients(NumClients, ServerPort, SeqNumServer) ->
 3087:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 3088:     set_random_seed(),
 3089:     lists:map(
 3090:       fun(Id) ->
 3091: 	      Req = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("req~3..0w", [get_next_sequence_number(SeqNumServer)])),
 3092: 	      Url = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(ServerPort) ++  "/" ++ Req,
 3093: 	      Pid = proc_lib:spawn(
 3094: 		      fun() ->
 3095: 			      case httpc:request(Url) of
 3096: 				  {ok, {{_,200,_}, _, Resp}} ->
 3097: 				      ct:log("[~w] 200 response: "
 3098: 					       "~p~n", [Id, Resp]),
 3099: 				      case lists:prefix(Req++"->", Resp) of
 3100: 					  true -> exit(normal);
 3101: 					  false -> exit({bad_resp,Req,Resp})
 3102: 				      end;
 3103: 				  {ok, {{_,EC,Reason},_,Resp}}  ->
 3104: 				      ct:log("[~w] ~w response: "
 3105: 					       "~s~n~s~n",
 3106: 					       [Id, EC, Reason, Resp]),
 3107: 				      exit({bad_resp,Req,Resp});
 3108: 				  Crap ->
 3109: 				      ct:log("[~w] bad response: ~p",
 3110: 					       [Id, Crap]),
 3111: 				      exit({bad_resp, Req, Crap})
 3112: 			      end
 3113: 		      end),
 3114: 	      MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 3115: 	      timer:sleep(10 + rand:uniform(1334)),
 3116: 	      {Id, Pid, MRef}
 3117:       end,
 3118:       lists:seq(1, NumClients)).
 3119: 
 3120: wait4clients([], _Timeout) ->
 3121:     ok;
 3122: wait4clients(Clients, Timeout) when Timeout > 0 ->
 3123:     Time = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 3124: 
 3125:     receive
 3126: 	{'DOWN', _MRef, process, Pid, normal} ->
 3127: 	    {value, {Id, _, _}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Clients),
 3128: 	    NewClients = lists:keydelete(Id, 1, Clients),
 3129: 	    wait4clients(NewClients, Timeout - inets_lib:millisec_passed(Time));
 3130: 	{'DOWN', _MRef, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 3131: 	    {value, {Id, _, _}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Clients),
 3132: 	    ct:fail({bad_client_termination, Id, Reason})
 3133:     after Timeout ->
 3134: 	    ct:fail({client_timeout, Clients})
 3135:     end;
 3136: wait4clients(Clients, _) ->
 3137:     ct:fail({client_timeout, Clients}).
 3138: 
 3139: 
 3140: %% -----------------------------------------------------
 3141: %% Webserver part:
 3142: %% Implements a web server that sends responses one character
 3143: %% at a time, with random delays between the characters.
 3144: 
 3145: start_slow_server(SeqNumServer) ->
 3146:     proc_lib:start(
 3147:       erlang, apply, [fun() -> init_slow_server(SeqNumServer) end, []]).
 3148: 
 3149: init_slow_server(SeqNumServer) ->
 3150:     Inet = inet_version(),
 3151:     {ok, LSock} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [binary, Inet, {packet,0}, {active,true},
 3152: 				     {backlog, 100}]),
 3153:     {ok, {_IP, Port}} = inet:sockname(LSock),
 3154:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self(), Port}),
 3155:     loop_slow_server(LSock, SeqNumServer).
 3156: 
 3157: loop_slow_server(LSock, SeqNumServer) ->
 3158:     Master = self(),
 3159:     Acceptor = proc_lib:spawn(
 3160: 		 fun() -> client_handler(Master, LSock, SeqNumServer) end),
 3161:     receive
 3162: 	{accepted, Acceptor} ->
 3163: 	    loop_slow_server(LSock, SeqNumServer);
 3164: 	shutdown ->
 3165: 	    gen_tcp:close(LSock),
 3166: 	    exit(Acceptor, kill)
 3167:     end.
 3168: 
 3169: 
 3170: %% Handle one client connection
 3171: client_handler(Master, LSock, SeqNumServer) ->
 3172:     {ok, CSock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
 3173:     Master ! {accepted, self()},
 3174:     set_random_seed(),
 3175:     loop_client(1, CSock, SeqNumServer).
 3176: 
 3177: loop_client(N, CSock, SeqNumServer) ->
 3178:     %% Await request, don't bother parsing it too much,
 3179:     %% assuming the entire request arrives in one packet.
 3180:     receive
 3181: 	{tcp, CSock, Req} ->
 3182: 	    ReqNum = parse_req_num(Req),
 3183: 	    RespSeqNum = get_next_sequence_number(SeqNumServer),
 3184: 	    Response = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~s->resp~3..0w/~2..0w", [ReqNum, RespSeqNum, N])),
 3185: 	    Txt = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("Slow server (~p) got ~p, answering with ~p",
 3186: 					      [self(), Req, Response])),
 3187: 	    ct:log("~s...~n", [Txt]),
 3188: 	    slowly_send_response(CSock, Response),
 3189: 	    case parse_connection_type(Req) of
 3190: 		keep_alive ->
 3191: 		    ct:log("~s...done~n", [Txt]),
 3192: 		    loop_client(N+1, CSock, SeqNumServer);
 3193: 		close ->
 3194: 		    ct:log("~s...done (closing)~n", [Txt]),
 3195: 		    gen_tcp:close(CSock)
 3196: 	    end
 3197:     end.
 3198: 
 3199: slowly_send_response(CSock, Answer) ->
 3200:     Response =  lists:flatten(io_lib:format("HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\nContent-Length: ~w\r\n\r\n~s",
 3201: 					    [length(Answer), Answer])),
 3202:     lists:foreach(
 3203:       fun(Char) ->
 3204: 	      timer:sleep(rand:uniform(500)),
 3205: 	      gen_tcp:send(CSock, <<Char>>)
 3206:       end,
 3207:       Response).
 3208: 
 3209: parse_req_num(Request) ->
 3210:     Opts = [caseless,{capture,all_but_first,list}],
 3211:     {match, [ReqNum]} = re:run(Request, "GET /(.*) HTTP", Opts),
 3212:     ReqNum.
 3213: 
 3214: parse_connection_type(Request) ->
 3215:     Opts = [caseless,{capture,all_but_first,list}],
 3216:     {match,[CType]} = re:run(Request, "connection: *(keep-alive|close)", Opts),
 3217:     case string:to_lower(CType) of
 3218: 	"close" -> close;
 3219: 	"keep-alive" -> keep_alive
 3220:     end.
 3221: 
 3222: set_random_seed() ->
 3223:     Unique = erlang:unique_integer(),
 3224:     A = erlang:phash2([make_ref(), self(), Unique]),
 3225:     rand:seed(exsplus, {A, A, A}).
 3226: 
 3227: 
 3228: otp_8739(doc) ->
 3229:     ["OTP-8739"];
 3230: otp_8739(suite) ->
 3231:     [];
 3232: otp_8739(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3233:     {_DummyServerPid, Port} = otp_8739_dummy_server(),
 3234:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 3235:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/dummy.html",
 3236:     Method      = get,
 3237:     Request     = {URL, []},
 3238:     HttpOptions = [{connect_timeout, 500}, {timeout, 1}],
 3239:     Options     = [{sync, true}],
 3240:     Profile     = ?profile(Config),
 3241:     case httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOptions, Options, Profile) of
 3242: 	{error, timeout} ->
 3243: 	    %% And now we check the size of the handler db
 3244: 	    Info = httpc:info(),
 3245: 	    ct:log("Info: ~p", [Info]),
 3246: 	    {value, {handlers, Handlers}} =
 3247: 		lists:keysearch(handlers, 1, Info),
 3248: 	    case Handlers of
 3249: 		[] ->
 3250: 		    ok;
 3251: 		_ ->
 3252: 		    ct:fail({unexpected_handlers, Handlers})
 3253: 	    end;
 3254: 	Unexpected ->
 3255: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, Unexpected})
 3256:     end.
 3257: 
 3258: otp_8739_dummy_server() ->
 3259:     Parent = self(),
 3260:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() -> otp_8739_dummy_server_init(Parent) end),
 3261:     receive
 3262: 	{port, Port} ->
 3263: 	    {Pid, Port}
 3264:     end.
 3265: 
 3266: otp_8739_dummy_server_init(Parent) ->
 3267:     Inet = inet_version(),
 3268:     {ok, ListenSocket} =
 3269: 	gen_tcp:listen(0, [binary, Inet, {packet, 0},
 3270: 			   {reuseaddr,true},
 3271: 			   {active, false}]),
 3272:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(ListenSocket),
 3273:     Parent ! {port, Port},
 3274:     otp_8739_dummy_server_main(Parent, ListenSocket).
 3275: 
 3276: otp_8739_dummy_server_main(_Parent, ListenSocket) ->
 3277:     case gen_tcp:accept(ListenSocket) of
 3278: 	{ok, Sock} ->
 3279: 	    %% Ignore the request, and simply wait for the socket to close
 3280: 	    receive
 3281: 		{tcp_closed, Sock} ->
 3282: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(ListenSocket)),
 3283: 		    exit(normal);
 3284: 		{tcp_error, Sock, Reason} ->
 3285: 		    ct:fail("socket error: ~p", [Reason]),
 3286: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(ListenSocket)),
 3287: 		    exit(normal)
 3288: 	    after 10000 ->
 3289: 		    %% Just in case
 3290: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(Sock)),
 3291: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(ListenSocket)),
 3292: 		    exit(timeout)
 3293: 	    end;
 3294: 	Error ->
 3295: 	    exit(Error)
 3296:     end.
 3297: 
 3298: send_multipart_chunks(Socket) ->
 3299:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("--chunk_boundary\r\n")),
 3300:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("Content-Type: text/plain\r\nContent-Length: 4\r\n\r\n")),
 3301:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("test\r\n")),
 3302:     ct:sleep(500),
 3303:     send_multipart_chunks(Socket).
 3304: 
 3305: receive_stream_n(_, 0) ->
 3306:     ok;
 3307: receive_stream_n(Ref, N) ->
 3308:     receive
 3309: 	{http, {Ref, stream_start, _}} ->
 3310: 	    receive_stream_n(Ref, N);
 3311: 	{http, {Ref,stream, Data}} ->
 3312: 	    ct:log("Data:  ~p", [Data]),
 3313: 	    receive_stream_n(Ref, N-1)
 3314:     end.
 3315: 
 3316: is_ipv6_supported() ->
 3317:     {ok, Hostname0} = inet:gethostname(),
 3318:     try 
 3319:         lists:member(list_to_atom(Hostname0), ct:get_config(ipv6_hosts))
 3320:     catch
 3321:          _: _ ->
 3322:             false
 3323:     end.
